column1: #Text=We can do this if we work together .
#Text=" Toph says : " As far as I can feel , we 're trapped in a giant bowl of sand pudding .
#Text=Any ideas how to find Ba Sing Se ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why do n't we ask the circle birds ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Ugh ... We 're getting out of this desert , and we 're going to do it together !
#Text=" Katara says : " I think we should stop for the night .
#Text=" Toph says : " Is there any more water ?
#Text=" Katara says : " This is the last of it .
#Text=" Katara says : " No , he has n't .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , let me see the things you got from the library .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , I was there .
#Text=" Aang says : " It does n't matter .
#Text=None of those will tell us where Appa is .
#Text=" Katara says : " No , but we can find out which way Ba Sing Se is .
#Text=We can use the stars to guide us .
#Text=That way we can travel at night when it 's cool and rest during the day .
#Text=" Katara says : " Just try to get some sleep .
#Text=We 'll start again in a few hours .
#Text=" Zuko says : " No one here is going to help us .
#Text=These people just look like filthy wanderers .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You brought us here to gamble on Pai Sho ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I do n't think this is a gamble .
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " Let 's take them now !
#Text=" Yu says : " This place is full of desperate characters .
#Text=If they find out we 're collecting a bounty , we might have to fight them all just to keep our prize .
